name: Super Jet Juck
description:
Explore the world with puzzles, fancy mechanisms and dangerous enemies!

Super Jet Juck is a dynamic platformer game full of skirmishes, puzzles and adventures. Join the heroic team - the fearless soldiers Juck and Tom on an exciting and dangerous journey.

You can play the game either alone or together on one computer!

So, you are the captain of a special unit of the army sent to the study of an abandoned space station. Your task is to destroy all defensive systems that have gone out of control!
